channel.title: Sticker on Mark Roepke
channel.description: Recent content in Sticker on Mark Roepke

item.title: A quick guide to creating a hex sticker
item.description:
In my first post I introduced flxr, a basic R package I wrote to retrieve basic movie data from the web. Because any respectable R package has a hex sticker, I decided to put my design skills to the test and create one for flxr. This is an overview of that process that can hopefully be followed by those wanting to create their own hex sticker.
hexSticker Package I had no idea where to begin in creating a hex sticker for flxr, but I immediately thought there could be an R package for creating hex stickers and I was correct.
